descriptions.title: Download Instagram videos, Reels & Stories for free
descriptions.main_desc: {site_name} is the ultimate Instagram video downloader that lets you save Instagram videos, Reels, Stories, and IGTV content in HD quality. Whether you want to download Instagram Reels for offline viewing or save Stories before they disappear, our tool makes it fast and easy. No app installation needed - just paste the Instagram URL and download instantly.
descriptions.how_to_title: How to download Instagram videos without watermark?
descriptions.how_to_subtitle: Download any Instagram content in just 3 simple steps.
descriptions.step1_desc: Open Instagram app or website, find the video, Reel, or Story you want to download. Tap the three dots menu and select Copy link.
descriptions.step2_desc: Return to {site_name} and paste the Instagram URL into the input field, then click the Download button.
descriptions.step3_desc: Choose your preferred quality and download the Instagram video, Reel, or Story directly to your device.
descriptions.note: Note: {site_name} respects Instagram's terms of service and creators' rights. Download content only for personal use and always credit original creators when sharing.

faq_section.title: Instagram Downloader FAQ
faq_section.a1: Yes, you can download Instagram Reels in HD quality. Just copy the Reel URL and paste it into our downloader.
faq_section.q2: How do I download Instagram Stories?
faq_section.a2: Copy the Story URL while viewing it and paste it into our tool. Stories can be downloaded before they expire.
faq_section.q3: Can I download private Instagram videos?
faq_section.a3: You can only download Instagram content that you have access to view. For private accounts, you must be following them.
faq_section.a4: We support MP4 video format which works on all devices. You can also extract audio in MP3 format.
faq_section.a5: No limits! Download unlimited Instagram videos, Reels, and Stories for free.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes, our Instagram video downloader is 100% free with unlimited downloads and no registration required.
faq.q2: Can I download HD Instagram videos?
faq.a2: Yes, you can download Instagram videos in HD quality (up to 1080p) when available from the original post.
faq.q3: Does it work with Instagram Reels and Stories?
faq.a3: Yes, our downloader supports Instagram Reels, Stories, regular videos, IGTV, and carousel posts.
faq.q4: Is it safe to download Instagram videos?
faq.a4: Absolutely! We use SSL encryption and don't store any personal data or downloaded videos on our servers.
